Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstructionManagerTest.MyCard, MovementManagerTest.MyCard
public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing game Cards with their powers.
Author:
AndreaAltomare

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card​(GodPower godPower, java.util.List<MoveChecker> moveCheckers, MoveExecutor moveExecutor, java.util.List<BuildChecker> buildCheckers, BuildExecutor buildExecutor, java.util.List<WinChecker> winCheckers, java.util.List<AdversaryMoveChecker> adversaryMoveCheckers)
      Constructs a Card object containing all the fundamental information about a chosen Card and its associated God's power.
      Parameters:
      godPower - Associated God's power
      moveCheckers - Checkers for Movement moves
      moveExecutor - Executor for Movement moves
      buildCheckers - Checkers for Construction moves
      buildExecutor - Executor for Construction moves
      winCheckers - Win-condition checkers for moves
      adversaryMoveCheckers - Checkers for Adversaries' Movement moves

    • isTurnCompleted

      public boolean isTurnCompleted()
      Returns:
      True iff Player has executed at least one Movement and one Construction in succession during the new Turn (so that the Turn is completed)
